```{r setup}
library(Lotto)
```

In order to draw numbers for standard lotto game, use function lotto as shown in example:
```{r example}
lotto()
```

You can also specify the argument draw_number to be an integer in range 6 to 12, for example:
```{r example}
lotto(draw_number = 12)
```
